research.index: Begin an attempt to research the technology. Follow the prompts for more information

join.index: Join as a new player. You must not already have joined, the player name must not be in use, and the player name must be unique

battle.index: Initiate an attack against the player, sending a number of soldiers to the front

info.index: Displays the attributes of the player

convert.index: Convert a number of people. The prompts provide additional information

default: `?admin`: Administrative commands. Most people will not be able to use this command

admin.index: Administrative commands. Most people will not be able to use this command
